alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 06 at 2:40PM AKDT until August 07 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * LOCATION...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * TIMING...Until Noon Sunday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion will occur. Belongings left on the beach may wash away. Logs and debris will wash up on to the beach. * WAVE AND SURF...West winds 20 to 30 mph will cause waves to build to 6 feet and allow the waves to crash onto the beach with surf washing to the top of the beach. Significant beach erosion is possible. Conditions will improve Sunday afternoon as winds and waves decrease.
info.instruction: A High Surf Advisory means that localized beach erosion is expected. Precautions should be taken to protect property.
